channel.title: Product on StackRef Whistle
channel.description: Recent content in Product on StackRef Whistle

item.title: Visit us on the Amazon Startup Showcase
item.description: Take a look at our profile on the Amazon Startup Showcase! If you have the means to do so, a thumb-up would be amazingly appreciated. Who knows – we might be a featured startup there some day!

item.title: StackRef Vendor Insights from Amazon
item.description: We’re excited to unveil a significant enhancement to our Amazon Marketplace offering: Vendor Insights!

item.title: We're now in the Amazon Marketplace store. Happy birthday, StackRef!
item.description: Yesterday (June 20) marked a year since StackRef was officially incorporated. Less-officially, StackRef has been around since 2021. Coincidentally, it’s also the day StackRef officially went live in the Amazon Marketplace! Currently the pricing works out like this: Purchase a monthly or yearly subscription for StackRef, in blocks of 100 or 1000 “StackCash.” A subscription immediately grants you the requested number of StackCash, either into your already-created account or to a new one, if you hadn’t created one yet.

item.title: Infracost and our own Cossell added to automated hackathon scoring
item.description: Exciting news is coming out of StackRef HQ as we announce the addition of two new automated judging tools for hackathons: Infracost and Cossell!
